body.p: The Board also addressed how deposit floors are considered when measuring insurance contracts. The ‘deposit floor’ is a term used to describe the following requirement in paragraph 47 of IFRS 13:

lq.p: The fair value of a financial liability with a demand feature (eg a demand deposit) is not less than the amount payable on demand, discounted from the first date that the amount could be required to be paid.
